results.title: Local drug delivery in the treatment of furcation defects in periodontitis: a systematic review
results.text_hl: Moreover, statins including @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ have been tested for their additional effect as adjunctive treatment to SRP for the treatment of mandibular grade @DISEASE_Oculocutaneous_albinism_type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:C537730 @@@II@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Furcation_Defects</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017823 @@@furcation defects@@@ and have shown significantly improved clinical and radiographic treatment outcomes, compared to SRP + placebo.

results.title: Comparative Analysis of Various Forms of Local Drug Delivery Systems on a Class 2 Furcation - A Systematic Review
results.text_hl: To analzse & compare various forms of local drug delivery systems on a class II @<m>DISEASE_Furcation_Defects</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017823 @@@furcation@@@. A search was conducted using PubMed, Google scholar, science direct, and Pub Med central using MeSH terms - local drug delivery in periodontics, @CHEMICAL_boric_acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:C032688 @@@boric acid@@@ in the management of class II @DISEASE_Mandibular_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D008338 @@@mandibular furcation@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Furcation_Defects</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017823 @@@furcation@@@.
